text: Mata arra ga kono yo ni ose rareta toki o omoe. `Maruyamu no ko isa yo, anata wa “arra no soto ni, watashi to watashi no haha to o 2 hashira no kami to seyo. ” To hitobito ni tsugeta ka.' Kare wa moshiageta. `Anata ni tatae are. Watashi ni ken'no no nai koto o, watashi wa iubekidearimasen. Mo shi watashi ga sore o ittanaraba, kanarazu anata wa shitte ora remasu. Anata wa, watashi no kokoronouchi o shitte ora remasu. Daga watashi wa anata no o kokoronouchi wa shirimasen. Hontoni anata wa subete no ogi o jukuchi nasa rete imasu
